## Source: ossf-package-analysis (d6f4c9090980b70af6effbd1be18a9ca571dd90a4f1cca30d44f84083dcec613)
The OpenSSF Package Analysis project identified 'asymmetric-key-generator' @ 9.9.9 (npm) as malicious.

It is considered malicious because:

- The package communicates with a domain associated with malicious activity.

- The package executes one or more commands associated with malicious behavior.
